sentences.en: " Oh, spare me your saga about shooting Yankees and facing Sherman's army.
sentences.cn: " 唔, 以后别再给我吹那些枪击北方佬和顶着谢尔曼军队的英雄事迹了.

sentences.en: After my high school saga, I never really had a chance to dance again.
sentences.cn: 在高中的传奇之后，我再也没有真正拥有过跳舞的机会了。

sentences.en: And let's not even talk about the impeachment saga.
sentences.cn: 更不用说那场弹劾故事了.

sentences.en: For Seymour, the saga of motherly love was anything but.
sentences.cn: 对于西摩来说，这是一个讲述母爱的传奇故事。

sentences.en: Herbert sat quietly through the telling of this saga.
sentences.cn: 在聆听这个长篇传奇故事时，赫伯特自始至终安静地坐着。

sentences.en: His suicide is the latest chapter in this terrible saga of greed and betrayal.
sentences.cn: 他的自杀是这部充满贪婪与背叛的可怕长篇故事的最新一章.

sentences.en: I don't know how this saga unfolded.
sentences.cn: ‘我不知道这传奇是怎么展开的’

sentences.en: It carries on the account of Bob Monroe's astonishing saga.
sentences.cn: 书中继续讲述鲍勃·门罗的惊人传奇.

sentences.en: Our saga, and my experiment, was over.
sentences.cn: 我们的“传奇”，我的实验，结束了。

sentences.en: Saga features trips for older people at home and abroad all through the year.
sentences.cn: “传奇”旅行社为老年人提供全年的国内外旅游服务。

sentences.en: Saga: Let's all be sexier at the stage right in particular.
sentences.cn: 让我们更加性感,尤其是台上的右边.

sentences.en: So what's the next phase of the delivery saga?
sentences.cn: 那什么时候开始下一段的送货冒险故事?

sentences.en: StarCraft II continues the epic saga of the Protoss , Terran, and Zerg.
sentences.cn: 星际争霸II延续了神族 、 人族和虫族的宏伟传奇.

sentences.en: The front page is devoted to the continuing saga of the hijack.
sentences.cn: 头版是对劫持事件的连续报道。

sentences.en: The president was clearly exasperated by the whole saga.
sentences.cn: 整个事件显然让总统很恼火。

sentences.en: The robbery touched off a dramatic saga of honor that lasted 31 years.
sentences.cn: 这宗抢案引起了历时三十一年之久的信义传奇.

sentences.en: The Volsunga Saga and Nibelungenlied hardly differ in anything but the name.
sentences.cn: 除了名字以外,《沃尔松格传说》和《尼伯龙根之歌》几乎一样.

sentences.en: The whole saga began back in May.
sentences.cn: 整件事情的开始要回溯到5月份。

sentences.en: We now proceed to give a slight sketch of the Volsunga Saga.
sentences.cn: 下面我们来简略介绍一下《沃尔松格传说》.

trans.tran_cn: 萨迦（尤指古代挪威或冰岛讲述冒险经历和英雄业绩的长篇故事），（讲述许多年间发生的事情的）长篇故事，传说，冒险故事，英雄事迹
trans.tran_en: one of the stories written about the Vikings of Norway and Iceland
